item.title: Domain Driven Design (DDD)
item.description: Domain Driven Design (DDD) is a methodology that empowers developers to create software systems closely aligned with the complexities of real-world business domains. In this comprehensive guide, we will explore the fundamentals of DDD, its core concepts, and practical applications within an e-commerce system using C# .NET Core. Understanding Domain Driven Design (DDD) At its essence, Domain Driven Design is an approach to software development that emphasizes collaboration between domain experts and developers.
